trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Corpus Christi
There were no other sightings in Corpus Christi on or around June 15th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsComing home from a date, parked my car in a parking lot. Took about 15 steps and seen this red orb come over the apartment building (3 stories) and when it came in front it stopped and backed up about 20 feet. While it backed up there was a line going up and down accross the orb. This lasted about 2 sec. and stopped and then it continued on its path going north. Just before it went over the building next to the parking lot it made a sharp 65 degree turn to the right only for a second the turn again to go in the orininal path and went out of sight.
Summary: It was small circular and red, moved at a slow and steady pace .
